settings.payment_text: Cash, Zelle, Credit and Debit cards are acceptable forms of payment.
settings.deposit_text: A deposit of $25 will be collected upon confirmation of appointment. Deposit will not be refunded. Late for 20 mins you will be charged $25. No show will automatically cancel your appointment and be charged full price. For more information, you can contact us directly.
settings.appointment_text: You must cancel the appointment 48 hours in advance. Your deposit will not be refunded. Please communicate with me if you will be tardy so I can adjust my schedule if need be. If not, you will be charged an additional $25
